attributes.action: More opportunities for youth; we are your future!
attributes.additional_details:
Please pledge your support for the government to increase the prospects for youth in the future in the fields of employment, education and social morality:

* education (EMA bought back, lower tuition fees, access to university and other forms of education)

* employment (helping the educated get educated at work and guaranteed jobs for people after completing their university degree)

* social morality (the law and its negative attitude to punish the youth and society's views on young people; single mothers, jobless parents, young parents, youths in prison)

"Government with the consent of the governed"...? - WHERE'S OUR CONSENT?
